name: Super Pirate Guy
description:
I made this game with python by following a tutorial and also adding in my own things. The tutorial I used was from ClearCode.  Hope you enjoy!

CONTROLS

A and D to move left and right

Spacebar to jump

ESC to exit out of game

M to mute

N to unmute

CREDITS
